I'll sleep a little to get better.\""},{"lineNumber":2065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うん。じっくり寝るのが一番だからね」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah. Getting plenty of rest is the best.\""},{"lineNumber":2066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おやすみなさい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Good night...\""},{"lineNumber":2067,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリはふぅ、と吐息を漏らして目を閉じた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol let out a sigh and closed her eyes."},{"lineNumber":2068,"originalJapaneseLine":"………………","translatedEnglishLine":".............."},{"lineNumber":2069,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"........"},{"lineNumber":2070,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":2071,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……………ん、ぁ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Hmm, ah...)"},{"lineNumber":2072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あれ……今は…………？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Huh... what time is it now...?\""},{"lineNumber":2073,"originalJapaneseLine":"周囲が静まりかえっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"The surroundings were completely quiet."},{"lineNumber":2074,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜……たぶん、深夜。","translatedEnglishLine":"Night... probably late at night."},{"lineNumber":2075,"originalJapaneseLine":"（んん……そう、あの時も、こんな時間で……","translatedEnglishLine":"(Hmm... yes, it was around this time back then too..."},{"lineNumber":2076,"originalJapaneseLine":"　部屋の隅に……）","translatedEnglishLine":"In the corner of the room...)"},{"lineNumber":2077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……起きたのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...You're awake.\""},{"lineNumber":2078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「っ、あ、カイトさ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, Kaito...!\""},{"lineNumber":2079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{"lineNumber":2080,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ………………ランス、さん……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah... Rance, sir...?\""},{"lineNumber":2081,"originalJapaneseLine":"目蓋の裏にちらついた誰かの姿が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The figure flickering behind her eyelids,"},{"lineNumber":2082,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだくらくらする頭の中に入り込んでくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"entered her still dizzy mind."},{"lineNumber":2083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずっと、そこにいてくれた、んですか……？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You've been here with me all this time...?\""},{"lineNumber":2084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあちょこちょこ様子を見にな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, I checked on you now and then.\""},{"lineNumber":2085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ありがとう……ございます……けほ、こほ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-thank you very much... cough, cough...\""},{"lineNumber":2086,"originalJapaneseLine":"「前も……その。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Before too... well,"},{"lineNumber":2087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そうやって、見てくれてた人がいて……","translatedEnglishLine":"there were people who looked after me like that..."},{"lineNumber":2088,"originalJapaneseLine":"　びっくりしました」","translatedEnglishLine":"I was surprised.\""},{"lineNumber":2089,"originalJapaneseLine":"「でも、心配する事はない、って言って……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"But you said there was nothing to worry about..."},{"lineNumber":2090,"originalJapaneseLine":"　手が、おっきくて……ごつごつしてて……","translatedEnglishLine":"Your hands were big... and rough..."},{"lineNumber":2091,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうしてか、かえって落ち着いたの……覚えてます」","translatedEnglishLine":"For some reason, I felt calmer... I remember that.\""},{"lineNumber":2092,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……こんな感じか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Like this?\""},{"lineNumber":2093,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":2094,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリの頭に手を乗せて、","translatedEnglishLine":"He placed his hand on Carol's head,"},{"lineNumber":2095,"originalJapaneseLine":"髪をかき混ぜるように撫でる。","translatedEnglishLine":"and stroked her hair as if ruffling it."},{"lineNumber":2096,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………はい……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes...\""},{"lineNumber":2097,"originalJapaneseLine":"キャロリの表情が、和らいだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Carol's expression softened."},{"lineNumber":2098,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……ムラムラしたから、","translatedEnglishLine":"(...I was getting aroused,"},{"lineNumber":2099,"originalJapaneseLine":"　治ったら襲おうと思ったのだが、","translatedEnglishLine":"so I thought I'd attack her once she got better,"},{"lineNumber":2100,"originalJapaneseLine":"　意外と重症だったらしいな……）","translatedEnglishLine":"but it seems it was more serious than I thought...)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 緑化病以外の病気、かかった事ありませんでした」「
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I have never caught any illness other than the greening disease."
"...And so you didn't realize until you reached your limit?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「というか、病気になるまで働いてるのがいかん。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "More than that, working until you got sick was wrong.
Make sure you get proper rest."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドの中に潜り直してから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After slipping back under the covers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリは年相応の表情で、くすっと笑った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol smiled softly with an expression befitting her age.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 発作で誰かが倒れた時は、大騒ぎで……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When someone collapsed from a seizure, there was a big fuss..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「治るように、って山菜を色々採ってきて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We gathered various wild vegetables hoping it would cure them..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 絶望的だったけど……一生懸命で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was hopeless... but we did our best..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、ただの風邪ならそんな大袈裟な話じゃない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, if it's just a common cold, it's not such a big deal.
There's no need to make a fuss."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「一番騒いでたのはランスだもんね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one making the most fuss was Rance, after all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ……治るように、少し、寝ますね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... I'll sleep a little to get better."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うん。じっくり寝るのが一番だからね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yeah. Getting plenty of rest is the best."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリはふぅ、と吐息を漏らして目を閉じた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Carol let out a sigh and closed her eyes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 周囲が静まりかえっていた。
（んん……そう、あの時も、こんな時間で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Hmm... yes, it was around this time back then too...
In the corner of the room...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目蓋の裏にちらついた誰かの姿が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The figure flickering behind her eyelids,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだくらくらする頭の中に入り込んでくる。
「ずっと、そこにいてくれた、んですか……？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You've been here with me all this time...?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあちょこちょこ様子を見にな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, I checked on you now and then."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ありがとう……ございます……けほ、こほ……」
そうやって、見てくれてた人がいて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there were people who looked after me like that...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「でも、心配する事はない、って言って……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "But you said there was nothing to worry about...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 手が、おっきくて……ごつごつしてて……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Your hands were big... and rough...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしてか、かえって落ち着いたの……覚えてます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For some reason, I felt calmer... I remember that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリの頭に手を乗せて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He placed his hand on Carol's head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 髪をかき混ぜるように撫でる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and stroked her hair as if ruffling it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: キャロリの表情が、和らいだ。
治ったら襲おうと思ったのだが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so I thought I'd attack her once she got better,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意外と重症だったらしいな……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but it seems it was more serious than I thought...)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then... I'll sleep a little to get better."
